content: /*<![CDATA[*/ $('#title').html($('meta[name=map-description]').attr('content')); /*]]>*/ New detailed view in Case Management June 26, 2024—Case Management now offers a detailed view of each case, allowing you to retrieve your case information and track progress easily. The new detailed view includes: Case activity. Notes and comments. Attachments. Execution results from Security Playbooks. For more information, see Case Management. Workflow and Automation → Case Management © 2025 Trend Micro Incorporated. All rights reserved.Search Knowledge Base

metadata.title: New detailed view in Case Management
